file_encoding.key_comment: [Optional] Define file encoding; If in doubt, leave it blank or use UTF8.

destination_file_dir.key_comment: Define the absolute path to your destination file directory. This directory will serve as the final destination for your extracted files.

newlines_in_values.key_comment: Whether newline characters are allowed in CSV values. Setting this to True reduces the performance of multi-threaded CSV reading.

ignore_empty_lines.key_comment: Whether empty lines are ignored in CSV input. If False, an empty line is interpreted as containing a single empty value (assuming a one-column CSV file).
